
name(Shifting Sands)

snap(-20,-20,-40)
sky(238,210,122)
fog(255,214,214)
clouds(255,255,255,5,-1000)
ground(227,218,202)
texture(0,0,0,20)
fadefrom(8000)
density(5)
mountains(67039)
nlaps(4)
soundtrack(the_red_rain.mod,224,98)
lightson()

set(47,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,5600,0)
set(10,0,11200,0)
set(14,0,15750,0)
